name: Parkour Champion 2 (Beta)
description:
Original (from old itch.io): 

https://radzik9988.itch.io/parkour-champion

The Parkour Champion is back at it again! 

From jumping over toxic bricks to collecting coins that unlock doors this game will keep you entertained!

Updates will be released often, adding new levels and more! Game currently has 10 levels.

What are you waiting for? Download now!

Current Version: Beta Release 1
